item.title: ELLIPS PERFORATED CHIPS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The Perforated Papad Chips that we present is processed with the help of automatic Italian plant under hygienic condition in 2D type. Having high crunchiness after frying and bitter taste, these have become preferred choices for a large number of children and adults. Widely used in homes, and restaurants, these have semi soft & hard texture and free from adulteration. Easy to fry and simple to digest, the Perforated Papad Chips are available with us in a variety of packaging options and sizes from 30 to 50kg.
Product Parameters
Moisture (%) 7.0-8.5
Products Pcs in 10g 4
Bulk Density (Before Fry) 260 Gm/Ltr
Bulk Density (After Fry) 22 Gm/Ltr
Salt (%) 2.5-3.0
Frying Temperature 185 ̊C to 190 ̊C
Frying Time 15-17 Second

item.title: MICRO CEREAL SNACKS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The Micro Fryums that we present is processed with the help of automatic Italian plant under hygienic condition in 2D type. Having high crunchiness after frying and bitter taste, these have become preferred choices for a large number of children and adults. Widely used in homes, and restaurants, these have semi soft & hard texture and free from adulteration. Easy to fry and simple to digest, the Micro Fryums are available with us in a variety of packaging options and sizes from 30 to 50kg.
Product Parameters
Moisture (%) 9-10%
Products Pcs in 10g 490
Bulk Density (Before Fry) 804 Gm/Ltr
Bulk Density (After Fry) 84 Gm/Ltr
Salt (%) 2.5-3.0
Frying Temperature 200 ̊C to 220 ̊C
Frying Time 1.5-2 Minutes
